info: Salvatore Maldera was born in Miranda, Venezuela in 1982. He started to make music with shareware midi software and casio keyboards in 1996. He plays all the instruments in his records including electric and acoustic guitars. Salvatore have been involved in some personal projects before like "Iulius" or "Tobe". He likes fresh indie/pop melodies and melancholic sound atmospheres produced by old sound chips. He studies literature and also have writen a book of short stories.
